channel.title: Illustrator on Yen's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Illustrator on Yen's blog

item.title: Ooh shiny
item.description: Some time ago I took a software engineering class. For the term project we divided up into teams and worked on a project of our own choosing from beginning to end. Ours was an e-commerce application, the source code for which still resides on Google Code. We were the Fantastic Five because, you’d never guess it, there were 5 of us. I created the logo for the project. For the “super-hero” effect, it has 2 stylized F’s, made to look like wings flanking a shield.
